node.data: {"menu":{"about":"About Us","services":"Services","portfolio":"Portfolio","contact":"Contact"},"aboutSection":{"titleBold":"Who","titleRest":"We Are","questionMark":"?","info1":"We have made a name for ourselves through our professionalism, promptness, and exceptional quality of parts. We offer competitive prices, a young and dynamic team that easily adapts to client requirements. We strive to achieve our goals with perseverance and provide the highest quality services.","info2":"Every part undergoes rigorous quality control, and we are dedicated to meeting our clients' needs with personalized solutions and impeccable results. We are flexible and prepared to offer tailored solutions for various types of projects. We trust in partnerships and maintain high standards in everything we do."},"partnerSection":{"info1":"We are trusted partners for local and international companies in the production of consumable parts for assemblies in various industries. We focus on delivering the highest quality parts that fully meet the specifications and requirements of our clients."},"servicesSection":{"titleBold":"Our","titleRest":"Services","info1":"We specialize in providing milling services for a diverse range of parts, assemblies, and sub-assemblies made from materials such as:","item1":"steel","item2":"aluminum","item3":"brass","item4":"copper","item5":"plastic"},"infoSection":{"title":"We Manufacture","info1":"these components according to technical drawings and models provided by clients. Whether it's mass production or unique pieces, we are equipped to make them. For dimensional and visual inspection of the manufactured parts, we have a wide range of modern measuring and control instruments."},"objectivesSection":{"title":"Company's Main Objectives","item1":"Continuous improvement of technological processes","item2":"Development and maintenance of the client portfolio: Our goal is to maintain relationships with existing clients and attract new clients from both the domestic and international markets.","item3":"Acquisition of coordinate measuring equipment","item4":"Acquisition of modern machinery: We aim to invest in modern and efficient machinery to quickly and efficiently meet our clients' requirements."},"portfolioSection":{"title":"Portfolio","subtitle":"The Art of Precision"},"contactSection":{"title":"Contact","fields":{"name":"Name","email":"Email","message":"Message","send":"Send"},"info":{"description":"ALS Metal-Innovation S.R.L. was established in 2021 as a fully Romanian-owned limited liability company.
